INSERT INTO product( prodType, prodUseFlag, prodName, prodScore, prodRegDate, feedSalaryAge, feedType, feedEtc, feedBrand, feedIngredient, feedSize, prodDelFlag, prodPetType ) VALUE ( #{prodType}, #{prodUseFlag}, #{prodName}, 0, date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), #{feedSalaryAge}, #{feedType}, #{feedEtc}, #{feedBrand}, #{feedIngredient}, #{feedSize}, 0, #{prodPetType} )
SELECT last_insert_id()

INSERT INTO feedinfo( infoPrice, infoWeight, infoDiscount, infoDelFlag, infoRegDate, infoMain, product_prodSeq ) VALUE ( #{infoPrice}, #{infoWeight}, #{infoDiscount}, 0, date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), #{infoMain}, #{prodSeq} )
SELECT last_insert_id()
mapper.select:
SELECT prodSeq, prodUseFlag, prodName, prodRegDate, prodModDate, feedSalaryAge, feedType, feedEtc, feedBrand, feedIngredient, feedSize, prodPetType, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feedInfo WHERE 1=1 AND prodSeq = product_prodSeq) AS infoCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM func WHERE 1=1 AND prodSeq = product_prodSeq) AS funcCount
ORDER BY prodSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT prodSeq, prodUseFlag, prodName, feedSalaryAge, feedType, feedEtc, feedBrand, feedIngredient, feedSize, prodPetType, prodScore, prodIsStock, prodPetType, b.infoDiscount, b.infoPrice, b.infoWeight, (b.infoPrice * (100 - infoDiscount) / 100) AS discountPrice, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE product_prodSeq = #{prodSeq}) AS reviewCount, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(infoWeight) FROM feedinfo WHERE product_prodSeq = #{prodSeq} GROUP BY product_prodSeq) AS weightArr FROM product LEFT JOIN feedinfo b ON prodSeq = b.product_prodSeq AND infoMain = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND prodSeq = #{prodSeq}
SELECT funcSeq, funcName FROM func LEFT JOIN product ON prodSeq = product_prodSeq WHERE 1=1 AND prodSeq = #{prodSeq}
SELECT infoSeq, infoPrice, infoWeight, infoDiscount FROM feedinfo LEFT JOIN product ON prodSeq = product_prodSeq WHERE 1=1 AND prodSeq = #{prodSeq}
